title: Prepare for more lux supports who will use their ult to kill secure.
body: We already have enough lux support players in solo queue, we don't need more.

replies.body: or we can just put the anime girl champ on perma ban until this ridiculous buff is removed
more like prepare for the pigeonholing of lux into the support role again xD
i like to support as lux but i use my ult to get enemies to low hp so that my adc can kill secure and get fed
